class MusicController < ApplicationController
  def play
    track_path = params[:track]
suffix_post:
track_data = track_file.read
    send_data track_data, type: 'audio/mpeg', disposition: 'inline'
  end
end

pre_tt:
class DocumentController < ApplicationController
  def view
    document_path = params[:doc_path]
suffix_post:
document_data = document.read
    send_data document_data, type: 'application/pdf', disposition: 'inline'
  end
end

  def view_code
    code_file_name = params[:code_file]
suffix_post:
code_data = code_file.readlines.join("

    render plain: code_data
  end
end
